ProviderOffering.name: ProviderOffering
ProviderOffering.description: Represents people or organizations associated with providing benefits to program participants.

BenefitId.description: The Benefit associated with the Provider Offering.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Provider Offering.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the Provider Offering.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the Provider Offering.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the provided Benefit.
